articles.description: The Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives stepped out for a lazy lunch in Mumbai over the weekend! Maheep Kapoor took to Instagram and revealed she joined Seema Khan, Bhavna Pandey and Gauri Khan for a casual get together with Neelam Kothari was MIA!
